definitions.definition: Characterized by or constituting (any kind of) irony .
Given to the use of irony; sarcastic .
Feigning ignorance ; simulating lack of instruction or knowledge ; exhibiting Socratic irony .

main_definition: Characterized by or constituting (any kind of) irony .
secondary_definitions: Given to the use of irony; sarcastic .
( obsolete ) Feigning ignorance ; simulating lack of instruction or knowledge ; exhibiting Socratic irony .
